root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-8-2, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Data availability:

The data is available for ILO member states that ratified both ILO Convention no. 87 and 98, which is currently 137 countries. This submission covers country, regional and global data from 2015 to 2020.

Disaggregation:

The disaggregation by sex and migrant status is not currently available.
